org.apache.flink.api.common.accumulators

Interface SimpleAccumulator<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Accumulator<T,T>, IOReadableWritable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleCounter, IntCounter, LongCounter

    public interface SimpleAccumulator<T>
extends Accumulator<T,T>
    Similar to Accumulator, but the type of items to add and the result value must be the same.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flink.api.common.accumulators.Accumulator

        add, getLocalValue, merge, resetLocal

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flink.core.io.IOReadableWritable

        read, write
